message.body: Al! I think I have to reschedule for tonight. I feel terrible and think I'm gonna go home and relax
Oh no!!! You're sick again?! It's ok. I don't mind chilling at home. I saw Amy 6 out of 7 days last week so I'm taking a breath!
Whoaaa!! 6out of seven Jeesh!! Hopefully not sick.
Tell me abt it. Feel better. Let's hang soon!
Sounds like a serious romance! I'll keep in touch this weekend!
Quit Penn today. I.e. why I wasn't feeling well last night. Stressful!
What?!?! Good for you. It's going to work out. Opens a door. I'll keep my ears open. Not sure of plans Sunday. Be in touch?
Sunday workday at the studio if you are game? 12- whenever??
I have two classes at uarts in the spring and IOD asked me to direct two videos in February so I'm feeling good. For now:) Text me Sunday! I Williston likely be there grading projects for HOURS.
U deserve to be out of that place. You'll have to fill me in. Talk soon!
